meanings.definition: Having a pleasant and distinctive smell.
meanings.sent1: The flowers were aromatic, filling the room with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: The aromatic candle made the house smell lovely.
meanings.sent3: The aromatic perfume was so strong that it attracted bees!
meanings.sent4: Her aromatic cooking always reminded him of his grandmother's kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The aromatic herbs in the garden added a delightful fragrance to the air.

meanings.definition: Substances that have a strong, pleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: She loved to use aromatic oils in her diffuser.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was filled with the aroma of fresh aromatic bread.
meanings.sent3: The aromatic spices in the soup made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The aromatic of coffee in the morning always woke her up.
meanings.sent5: The aromatic of pine trees in the forest was invigorating.

meanings.definition: The characteristic smell of a particular substance.
meanings.sent1: The aromatic of freshly baked cookies wafted through the house.
meanings.sent2: The aromatic of the ocean always brought back childhood memories.
meanings.sent3: The aromatic of popcorn at the movies made her stomach growl.
meanings.sent4: The aromatic of rain on dry earth was a welcome relief.
meanings.sent5: The aromatic of a campfire on a chilly night was comforting.
